title: Couple With Heart Person Person Light Skin Tone Medium Skin Tone
description: Represents a couple in love, with one person having a light skin tone and the other a medium skin tone, connected by a heart.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the couple with heart emoji depicts two figures in a tender embrace, their skin tones a harmonious blend of light and medium, showcasing Apple's commitment to diverse representation. A vibrant, glowing heart hovers between them, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and soft gradients, radiating warmth and affection. This emoji on Apple devices beautifully symbolizes romantic love, deep connection, and cherished relationships, appearing with a polished, heartfelt glow.
